summary: Lizzie McGuire is an American children's situation comedy television show.
full_text: Jake Thomas  is an American actor, perhaps best known for his role as Matt McGuire, the titular character's younger brother, in the Disney Channel show Lizzie McGuire . In 2002, he won a Young Artist Award for supporting actor for his performance in A.I. Artificial Intelligence . He was also seen in Cory in the House , playing the role of Jason Stickler.
title: Jake Thomas
